update sd_conference
ruid = #{ruid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
conference_subject = #{conferenceSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
conference_desc = #{conferenceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sd_conference set ruid = #{ruid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conference_subject = #{conferenceSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conference_desc = #{conferenceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conference_mode = #{conferenceMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, room_capacity = #{roomCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_limit = #{inviteLimit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from sd_conference a where a.`status`=2 and ( (a.user_id = #{userId} and del = 0) or a.ruid in ( select ruid from sd_conf_part_history b where b.user_id = #{userId} and del = 0)) order by start_time desc
mapper.update: update sd_conference set del = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from sd_conference a where a.`status` != 2
